actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that for fiscal year 1975 the Administration on Aging fund long-term and short-term training programs under title IV of the Older Americans Act.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of Congress that (1) for fiscal year 1975 the Administration on Aging fund both long-term and short-term training programs under title IV of the Older Americans Act and (2) the Administration on Aging give clear directives immediately on how these funds may be utilized to respond to the need for training students at higher educational institutions and for the purpose of covering the costs of courses in gerontology.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress that for fiscal year 1975 the Administration on Aging fund long-term and short-term training programs under title IV of the Older Americans Act.
